import React, { useState } from 'react' export default function SidebarRight() { const [interestsValue, setInterestsValue] = useState(50) const [ageValue, setAgeValue] = useState(50) const [friendsValue, setFriendsValue] = useState(50) const [isFriendValue, setIsFriendValue] = useState(50) return (
